content.raw:
To reproduce:

1. Start gazebo
2. Right click ground_plane
3. Click Apply Force/Torque
4. Application closes.

Terminal output:

    $ gazebo

    terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::FileNotFoundException'
      what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(6:FileNotFoundException): Cannot locate resource arial.ttf in resource group Fonts or any other group. in ResourceGroupManager::openResource at /builddir/build/BUILD/ogre-1.9.0/OgreMain/src/OgreResourceGroupManager.cpp (line 756)
    AL lib: (WW) alcCloseDevice: Releasing context 0x55a9464b2030`

This happens on gazebo-0:7.4.0-2.fc25.x86_64 on Fedora 25.
